attributes.action: bring back the Cadburys Wispa chocolate bar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cadburys stopped producing the Wispa bar in September 2003, and replaced it with the inferior Dairy Milk Bubbly. We, the people, demand the return of the Wispa, a superior, more velvety chocolate bar.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
